Text.Page:
Ramsleigh thinks the vulcans are to blame for the deaths of countless soldiers. The truth? Thulsa's minions are a gold piece a dozen in Wyrmgorge. He just wants someone to blame.

The maligoses, as well as vulcans, crush our soldiers like scorpions under their heels.

But you...you're very strong. You can take them.
I wasn't sure it could be done. My hat is off to you, <PCNAME>!
